name: Hill of Corps
description:
CONTROLS:

MOVE --> A (LEFT) D (RIGHT)

SHOOT --> LEFT MOUSE

AIM --> MOUSE

JUMP --> SPACE

CHANGE WEAPON --> (1) RIFLE.  (2) SHOTGUN. (3) ANTIMATERIAL CANNON

Defeat your enemies and use their bodies for make a corpse tower for destroy the evil genius Dr.Brain.

You can use three different weapons; rifle, shotgun and antimaterial cannon. The first have infinite ammo, the second shoot a bullet barrage and the third is a devastate weapon able to destroy many enemies with a single shoot.

The evil Dr.Brain use his psyquic powers for invoke enemies, create deadly energy balls and imitate the funcionality of your principal weapons.

Good Luck!

PD: I made this game in a week for improve my programming skills.
